post.body: - hey gorgeous!!!
- She's a sweetheart, but Bob is having allergic reactions to her. We need to find her a good home. Spread the word!
what fiber? Pls not what I gave you?
- Thanks! Almost done.
- ugh. Time? Food?
- Almost as weird as toillette water? (Grade school cologne)
- I second that declaration!
- Sometimes a nice white american cheese is all I need.
- woo hoo! See you there lady!
- sweet jebus
- It's beautiful!
- You should check out her other Thursday posts. Hysterical. Those are the people who give us a bad name.
- Those crazy designers PAY people to do that!
- nope! Black pugs have a single coat, so not so much on allergic reactions!
- She's a bit scared of Bella, and Bella just wants to play. Give baby about two weeks and she's be fully assimilated!
- Her name is Jenny and she's 7 months old. Name may change. She's a sweetie.
http://www.landsend.com has zip front robes. I have one. Look under sleepwear.
- These handles are actually friendly to people who have issues with regular knobs.
- Fingers crossed! Good luck!
Umm decorate.
Good old fashion sugar cookie! You can dwcoraye them with colored sugar and sprinkles!
- Nope - it's a vegetable! Vegetables are good!
- Yay for feeling better eye!
- I was scrubbing a tub not beating Bob, although he does need it apparently! I'll remind him to get that to you!
- I'm planting a raised bed this coming year too! Homegrown tomatoes! Lettuce, squash! Yum!
- Heh - we usually eat off separate plates, but share the same water!
-Word of mouth from my homies. It's here http://tinyurl.com/6yu8ku Getting my box!
- Yes. I have my priorities straight!
Hatmaker
Stay in your jammies and watch tv! Relax sweetie, you've earned it.
Yay! I hope y'all have a wonderful Christmas!
Are you okay? Those bastages!
Thank you!
Ive been trying to shake them myself. Big hug to you!
Yes. We were at wallyworld. I had a cart full of stuff already bought and we hadba miscommunication. I felt so bad!
Jodigreen.ca. She makes awesome books and stuff

Working from home means office work and cleaning for the upcoming office party. Wrist is still sore but I keep plugging along!
Going to a christmas party soon. Lost yesterday to a migraine (only 1 margarita fri nite Fefi) but Bob is going to pick up the slack for me!
